messages.title: Local people are backing Rachel
messages.content: Local people are backing Rachel MACLEAN to be our next MP. They want Rachel to be the strong local voice that Birmingham Northfield needs.

messages.title: Rachel is positive about our area
messages.content: Rachel is positive about politicians and the fact they are always so negative about the UK and the country as a whole. When I first met Rachel I was impressed by her positivity about the UK and Northfield. That's why I volunteered to help Rachel in her clean ups to make our area an even better place to live.

messages.title: Fighting unwanted developments
messages.content: I contacted Rachel about unwanted developments in our area as I was very concerned. She got in touch straight away and arranged to come over and discuss it, listen to our views. I was very impressed with Rachel; she committed to our area. It's great to see her standing up for residents like me on the issues that matter to us.

messages.title: For a strong and effective MP who will be accountable to you

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More affordable housing for local families in our area
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Rachel is fighting to ensure that there are more affordable housing options available for families in the Birmingham Northfield area.
Rachel and the Conservatives are supporting and benefiting local businesses in the area.
Rachel has been actively fighting against the Garden Tax to relieve the local residents from this financial burden.
Rachel has been involved in cleaning up the area when the council wouldn't, showing commitment to the local environment.

issues.environment: Rachel cleans up our area when the council won't

housing.content: More affordable housing for local families in our area

endorsements.endorsement: I own City Hire Tools in Longbridge. Thanks to Rachel, my business is thriving - she helped me to start. That's such a difference from just four more years of empty promises under Labour, so Rachel has my vote!

I called up Rachel and her team to clear up my street when the council wouldn't. Rachel is so hands-on and it's inspiring for someone like me. Potholes fixed and a thorough clean-up have made a huge difference.

I've never been involved in campaigning before, but Rachel's enthusiasm for our area is both inspiring and contagious. I don't often see politicians up ladders cleaning street signs so you know her dedication to our area is real.

quotes.text: I am so frustrated by Labour politicians and the fact that they are always so negative about the UK and the country as a whole. When I first met Rachel I was impressed by her positivity about the UK and Northfield. That's why I volunteered to help Rachel in her clean ups to make our area an even better place to live.

As a pensioner who lives alone, I was completely overawed by piles of rubbish. There was dumping outside my gate. People were so chance I could lift it myself. I contacted Rachel and she cared about me and the rubbish. She's even got clear to a ‘dumping sign’. I'm so impressed!
My husband and I are just starting a family and I’m just starting a business. The Conservatives support small businesses and a recovering economy. It’s the perfect time to do both.

images.caption: More affordable housing for local families in our area.
Rachel and the Conservatives support small businesses in our area.
Rachel cleans up our area when the council won't.
For a strong and effective MP who will be accountable to you, vote Rachel MACLEAN on 7th May.
